# The `DependenceGraphInfo` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Encapsulate some common data and functionality needed for different variations of data dependence graphs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Encapsulate some common data and functionality needed for different variations of data dependence graphs.

### getDependenceString() {#a27ee6955874121a35f638980ee126670}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename NodeType&gt;</>}

Return a string representing the type of dependence that the dependence analysis identified between the two given nodes.

This function assumes that there is a memory dependence between the given two nodes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h/#l00286">286</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>.

Collect all the data dependency infos coming from any pair of memory accesses from <code>Src</code> to <code>Dst</code>, and store them into <code>Deps</code>.

Return true if a dependence exists, and false otherwise.
